WRITING.TEXT:
Yahoo seems to be set up for game by game predictions like an NFL pool. I think in past WC's I've done pools more like an NCAA basketball bracket where you have to predict the F4 and so on before the tournament begins.
Any recommendations? Also, is there a reddit pool?
